input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: MUNICIPALITY OF CARCASSONNE. Summary: Public Service Delegation for the Design, Creation and Operation of the Heat Network in the Bastide Saint Louis District in the Community of Carcassonne. Description: The purpose of this consultation is to entrust a concessionaire with the design, financing, construction and operation of the heating network in the Bastide Saint Louis district of the city of Carcassonne. It follows a deliberation No. 037 dated June 26, 2025, by which the City of Carcassonne approved the principle of public service delegation. The Contract will be executed at the Concessionaire's own risk, in application of the general principles of concession law and of all legal and regulatory provisions in force at the time of its execution. In particular, the Concessionaire will assume a risk linked to the operation of the services, the part of the risk transferred being understood within the meaning of the second paragraph of Article L. 1121-1 of the Public Procurement Code. They are awarded according to the call for tenders procedure. open, subject to the provisions of articles L. 2124-2, R. 2124-2 and R. 2161-1 to 5 of the Code. They constitute framework agreements with purchase orders subject to the provisions of articles L.2125-1 and R.2162-1 to R.2162-6 of the Code. Each contract will be awarded to a single holder for a maximum period of 4 years including renewals. As this is an open procedure, the maximum number of participants is not limited. input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: COMMUNITY OF COMMUNITIES OF SISTERONAIS-BUËCH. Summary: Supply Contract for the Creation of an Inflatable Water Park at La Germanette. Description: The purpose of this contract is the acquisition, delivery, installation and commissioning of inflatable aquatic modules intended to equip the Germanette leisure center, located in the town of Serres (Hautes-Alpes - 05). Is integrated into this market for the acquisition of life jackets. The Community of Communes of Sisteronais-Buëch (CCSB), owner and manager of the site, wishes to strengthen the attractiveness of this swimming and leisure area by setting up a water park modular and secure inflatable, suitable for family and summer use. This project is part of the CCSB's desire to diversify the region's tourist offering and promote this site, while guaranteeing the safety of users and the sustainability of the equipment acquired. Published Date: 2025-12-25. Closing Date: 2026-02-02. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: VIENNE DEPARTMENTAL FIRE AND RESCUE SERVICE. Summary: Multi-Parameter Defibrilators. Description: The framework agreement concerns the purchase of multi-parameter defibrillators, the need for which is currently estimated at 70 multi-parameters and related equipment. These medical devices are capable of monitoring victims, adults or children, by measuring the vital parameters (SpO2-SpCO-NIBP), perform ECGs, transmit them remotely and perform semi-automatic and manual defibrillation. These class III medical devices require regular monitoring. In fact, a preventive maintenance contract and curative for a period of 8 years is backed by the contract MULTI-PARAMETER DEFIBRILATORS The framework agreement concerns the purchase of multi-parameter defibrillators, the need for which is currently estimated at 70 multi-parameters and related equipment. These medical devices class III require regular monitoring. input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: BORDEAUX METROPOLIS. Summary: Framework Agreement for Purchase Orders for Development, Maintenance and Upkeep of Recycling Centers and Related Sites. Description: The framework agreement will be executed by issuing purchase orders. Each lot will be awarded separately. The services are regulated by unit and fixed prices. The estimated amounts are indicative and include all of the renewal periods. This contract concerns a framework agreement with a purchase order for the development, maintenance and upkeep of recycling centers and related sites in Bordeaux Métropole, whatever their situation, which must: - Be compliant with the “Production Guide” relating to compensatory rainwater sanitation solutions in BORDEAUX METROPOLE. - In all cases be the subject of a special study - Obtain the agreement of the Project Manager (Bordeaux Metropolis). The market is divided into two lots: - Lot 1: projects for small and medium-sized interventions less than 150,000 euro(s) excluding tax - Lot 2?: construction sites for major interventions exceeding 150,000 euro(s) excluding tax The start date of the market is given as an indication Construction site for small and medium interventions Construction site for small and medium interventions<br> Construction site for major interventions Construction site for major interventions<br> Doc Title: Framework voucher agreement order for development, maintenance and maintenance work for recycling centers and related sites Contract Type: works. input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: GREATER BESANÇON METROPOLIS. Summary: Printing and Supply of Flaunting, Signage and Pos for the City of Besançon and Grand Besançon Métropole. Description: As part of a global reflection on optimization and greater pooling of resources, the City of Besançon and Grand Besançon Métropole have joined forces, in the form of a group of orders, to enter into a framework agreement relating to the printing and supply of cladding, signage and POS for the two communities. The coordinator is Grand Besançon Métropole The framework agreement will be executed by issuing purchase orders. Each lot will be awarded separately. Lot 1 will be awarded to a maximum of 3 economic operators (subject to a sufficient number of offers) and lots 2, 3 and 4 to a single economic operator. input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: LOIRE ATLANTIQUE DEPARTMENTAL COUNCIL. Summary: Reconstruction of the Auguste Mailloux College in Loroux-Bottereau. Description: Each lot will be awarded separately. Services are paid by fixed prices. The departmental college plan, updated in 2019, highlighted the need to rebuild the Auguste Mailloux college in Loroux-Bottereau. THE future establishment, with a capacity of 28 divisions, will be rebuilt on a plot directly adjoining the current college. The establishment will include an educational inclusion unit (ULIS), premises intended for administration, teachers, a center health, maintenance premises as well as 3 staff accommodation. External developments necessary for the proper functioning of the establishment will complete this reconstruction: access, forecourt, parking. In total, the surface area is estimated at 4,700 m² of useful surfaces. Old buildings will be deconstructed and asbestos removed The portion of the financial envelope allocated to the work is 14,997,100 euro(s) excluding tax (value September 2023). Delivery of the new college (teaching building-phase 1) is planned for the start of the 2028 school year. At the end of the various stages of demolition-asbestos removal then reconstruction, the overall completion of the operation will take place in the first quarter of 2030 VRD-Road Networks Miscellaneous Big work Frame Waterproofing Cover Facade coverings Exterior joinery Locksmith Partitions / Linings False ceilings Interior joinery Floor coverings Painting / Cleaning Heating Ventilation Plumbing Electricity CFO / CF.... Published Date: 2025-12-23. Closing Date: 2026-02-12. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: TOWN OF SAINTE-MAXIME. Summary: Complete Renovation of the Positive Cold Production of the Central Kitchen. Description: The project consists of carrying out a complete renovation of the positive cold production of the municipal central kitchen of Sainte-Maxime. The intervention aims to completely replace the existing installation operating on R448A, which has become obsolete, with one new installation operating with HFO R1234yf fluid, classified A2L, compliant with the future obligations of the F-Gas III regulations. The installation must make it possible to continuously ensure the required temperature levels in the various refrigeration rooms, without significant interruption of activity in the central kitchen. The services will be remunerated by application of the overall fixed price as specified in the breakdown of the overall and fixed price, which will be reported in the act of commitment when of the attribution COMPLETE RENOVATION OF THE POSITIVE COLD PRODUCTION OF THE CENTRAL KITCHEN The project consists of carrying out a complete renovation of the positive cold production of the municipal central kitchen of Sainte-Maxime. input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: SEMOP TRANSPORT OF THE EUROMETROPOLIS OF METZ. Summary: Sourcing as Part of the Project to Acquire Electric Buses with their Pantograph or Flash Fast Charging System to Replace the Current 24M Hybrids. Description: As part of its energy transition strategy and the evolution of its BHNS lines, Transport de l'Eurométropole de Metz (which takes over, on January 1, 2026, from Transport de l'Agglomération de Metz Métropole (TAMM)), is launching a phase of sourcing aimed at identifying manufacturers capable of supplying 100% electric buses of 18 m and 24 m, as well as charging solutions adapted to operation in High Level of Service Bus (BHNS) mode. The objectives of sourcing are following: - Evaluate the maturity of the 18 m and 24 m electric bus solutions available or in the process of being approved. - Know the technical, industrial and logistical conditions of production. - Anticipate risks and optimization levers to successful integration on METTIS lines. The vehicles concerned by the sourcing are 100% electric articulated buses of 18 m and 24 m: - Compliance with European standards and urban integration constraints (templates, ramps, radius of gyration). - Passenger capacity adapted to the needs of METTIS lines (Nb Passenger / rate). - Performance in real operating conditions (autonomy, consumption, reliability). Information on charging solutions: - Charging systems depot, at terminus and online (pantograph, OppCharge, CCS2, etc.). - Integration of energy infrastructures (power, cycles, depot interfaces). - Partnerships with integrators for a solution.... Published Date: 2025-12-23. Closing Date: 2026-02-06. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: CIVILIAN. Summary: Relaunch of Lot N°5 of the Cybersecurity Services and Tools Market: Identity Management Software in Active Directory and Bastion Software. Description: The purpose of this contract is to implement Cybersecurity services and solutions: - Lot n°1: Identity management software in Active Directory? - Lot n°2: Bastion software. This concerns the relaunch of lot no. 5 of the services market and of cybersecurity tools, following an unsuccessful attempt. CIVIS wishes to implement an identity and access management (IAM) solution offering multi-factor authentication (MFA) for Active Directory, single sign-on (SSO), Contextual access controls and simple and efficient session management. The solution must be a SAAS solution in CAPEX mode in advance over 3 years. It should make it possible to organize the governance of the security of the CIVIS IS by a combination of processes ensured and executed by the governing body. It must enable the management of risks which could prevent the achievement of the objectives of CIVIS. Finally, it must enable the management of compliance of policies, procedures, laws and regulations of the CIVIS (NIS2). CIVIS wishes to set up a Bastion d'administration or PAM (Privileged Access Management) solution certified by ANSSI, to supervise, control, trace and protect its network and its servers from access to privileges. Doc Title: Relaunch of lot n°5 of the cybersecurity services and tools market: Identity management software in Active Directory and Bastion Software Contract Type: supplies. Published Date: 2025-12-23. Closing Date: 2026-01-22. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: COMMUNITY OF COMMUNES OF THE 4 VALLEYS (C.C.4.V.). Summary: Supply of Foodstuffs for Collective Catering in the Community of Communes of the 4 Vallées. Description: The purpose of these specifications is to define the specific technical clauses of the contracts concerning the supply of foodstuffs for collective catering in the Communauté de communes des 4 Vallées (CC4V). The CC4V carried out a upgrading of a kitchen and 3 dining rooms for the consumption of more than 650 meals per day. The target objective is to reach 1,500 meals/day, with a gradual ramp-up of on-site production. To date, the kitchen of the CC4V produces for several types of guests: -School guests and adult supervisors (465 meals/day), during school hours, -Early childhood guests (25 meals/day) -Adult working guests in ESAT (160 meals/day). The second level of production is around 1000 meals/day and the third at 1500 meals/day, with the implementation of services for seniors and for businesses. 1st range organic fruits and vegetables In accordance with the requirements of the CCTP Fruits and vegetables organic 5th range 4th range vegetables - reserved market Conventional 1st, 4th and 5th range fruits and vegetables and valuable mentions Farm pasta Farm legumes Conventional and labeled grocery store Farm-raised pork meat in balance and to the piece Beef meat breeds in balance Sheep meat in balance educational missions Conventional and labeled pork, beef and sheep meats by the piece Conventional poultry meat.... input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: MUNICIPALITY OF SAINT-GERMAIN-EN-LAYE. Summary: Various Services for the Organization of the Fête Des Loges. Description: This framework agreement covers various services for the organization of the Fête des Loges. The Fête des Loges is a fairground event which takes place annually during the summer period. It is held at the location: Esplanade des Loges . Lot 2: Water network installation and management services The framework agreement consists of installing the water supply to the various bungalows and caravans of the Fête des Loges during the event. Lot 3: Office of control of facilities The framework agreement consists of verifying various installations located on the Esplanade des Loges by an approved inspection office. The festival includes 132 locations including 7 restaurants, 8 refreshment bars and 8 candy stores. These figures may vary from year to year. They will be provided to the service provider each year before the start of his mission. Lot 4: Removal, maintenance and reinstallation of safety barriers and/or concrete separators The annual service consists of the removal, maintenance and refitting of crash barriers and/or concrete separators. Doc Title: Various services for the organization of the Fête des Loges Contract Type: supplies. Published Date: 2025-12-22. Closing Date: 2026-01-19. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: SCHOOL FUND OF THE 15TH DISTRICT. Summary: Supply and Delivery of Food. Description: The purpose of this framework agreement is the supply and delivery of foodstuffs to the Caisse des Schools in the 15th arrondissement of Paris for the production of meals intended for schools and health centers leisure. The framework agreement is concluded for a initial period from March 2 to December 31, 2026 or failing that for an initial period running from the date of notification until December 31, 2026 if the date of notification of market is after March 2, 2026. The renewal will be carried out for a period from January 1 to December 31 of the following year. Each of the framework agreements may be renewed under the same terms, a maximum of 3 times, for a period of twelve months, by tacit renewal. If the contracting authority decides to renew the framework agreement, the holder will not be able to refuse this renewal. The maximum duration of the framework agreement, renewal periods included, is therefore forty-six months. The market includes 10 lots which are as follows: Lot NO 01 BAKERY BREAD - PASTRIES Conventional and from organic farming Lot NO 02 FRESH MEATS (BEEF, VEAL, LAMB) Lot NO 03 FRESH PORK MEAT And charcuterie Lot NO 04 FRESH POULTRY MEAT AND FROZEN Lot NO 05 FRESH FISH Lot NO06 PRODUCTS FROZEN Lot NO 07 FRESH FRUITS AND VEGETABLES 4th AND 5th RANGE FRUITS AND VEGETABLES RANGE Lot NO 08 GROCERY PRODUCTS Lot NO 09 CREAM (BUTTER - MILK - CHEESE - EGGS Lot NO 10 FRENCH PICNICS.... Published Date: 2025-12-22. Closing Date: 2026-01-13. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: GRAND EST REGION. Summary: Supply and Installation of Multimedia Equipment for Educational Establishments in the Grand Est Region, the European Community of Alsace and the Meuse Department as Well as for The.... Description: Supply and installation of multimedia equipment for educational establishments in the Grand Est Region, the European Community of Alsace and the Meuse department as well as for the... The market subject of the consultation aims at the acquisition and the installation of multimedia equipment for public high schools in the Grand Est Region and public middle schools in the European Community of Alsace (CeA) and the Meuse Department, i.e. 406 educational establishments as well as for the needs of internal services of the Grand Est Region. In this context, the Region, the CeA and the Meuse department have come together in a group of orders of which the Grand Est Region is the coordinator. The contract aims at the acquisition and (possible) installation multimedia equipment: video projectors and screens, printers, viewers, speakers, accessories and software licenses... as well as training. Furthermore, subsequent contracts may be concluded to meet any new needs, particularly in the context of the implementation of systems linked to hybridization* and materials and accessories for calls for academic projects around Nomad TVs and video capture. To keep the stock of educational establishments up to date, the Grand Est Region replaces around 900 aging equipment per year; the CeA replaces around 200 to 500 aging pieces of equipment per year, and the Meuse Department replaces (since 2023) its entire video projector fleet (around 500), at the speed of approximately 100 video projectors per year (this replacement program is expected to end in December 2027). Summary: Works Contract for the Restructuring and Extension of the Technical Platform of the Saint-Omer Regional Hospital Center (Complementary Aoo Lot C and D). Description: This consultation concerns a works contract for the restructuring and extension of the technical platform of the Saint-Omer Regional Hospital Center. This consultation went through an open call for tender procedure, carried out under articles L.2124-2, R.2124-1, R2124-2 1° and R.2161-2 to R.2161-5 of the Public Procurement Code. As part of the previous procedure, lots C and D were declared without further action, in particular due to a poor definition of the need. Description: This is an open call for tenders pursuant to articles L2124-2, R2124-2, 1° and R2161-2 to R2161-5 of the Public Order Code. The public market is a framework agreement which sets out all the contractual stipulations. It is executed gradually the issuance of purchase orders under the conditions set out in articles R. 2162-13 and R. 2162-14 of the public procurement code. For all lots, the framework agreement is concluded without minimum and with maximum expressed in quantity for their entire duration. validity within the meaning of article R2162-4, 2° of the public procurement code. The maximum quantities are defined for the entire duration of the public market in Appendix 1 of the CCTP Catalog of Requirements. For all lots, the public market is single-awarded. The public contract is processed at unit prices set in the unit price schedule (BPU) and in the catalog of the holder of the lot concerned. All supplies that can be ordered are described in the specific technical clauses (CCTP) and in the catalog of the holder of the lot concerned. The estimated quantities of the public contract are given in Annex 1 of the RC Table of quantities. These quantities have no contractual value. They are only used for analyzing offers. The validity period of offers is set at SEVEN (7) months from the deadline for receipt of offers.. Published Date: 2025-12-22. Closing Date: 2026-01-23. Competition: ICB. The estimated quantities of the public contract are given in Annex 1 of the RC Table of quantities. These quantities have no contractual value. They are only used for analyzing offers. The validity period of offers is set at SEVEN (7) months from the deadline for receipt of offers.

input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: COMMUNITY OF COMMUNITY OF THE 4 VALLEYS (C.C.4.V.). Summary: Supply of Foodstuffs for Collective Catering in the Community of Communes of the 4 Vallées. Description: The purpose of these specifications is to define the specific technical clauses of the contracts concerning the supply of foodstuffs for collective catering in the Communauté de communes des 4 Vallées (CC4V). The CC4V carried out a upgrading of a kitchen and 3 dining rooms for the consumption of more than 650 meals per day. The target objective is to reach 1,500 meals/day, with a gradual ramp-up of on-site production. To date, the kitchen of the CC4V produces for several types of guests: - School guests and adult supervisors (465 meals/day), during school hours, - Early childhood guests (25 meals/day) - Working adult guests in ESAT (160 meals/day). The second level of production is around 1000 meals/day and the third at 1500 meals/day, with the implementation of services for seniors and for businesses.. Published Date: 2025-12-21. Closing Date: 2026-01-29. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

output.Purchaser_Name: COMMUNITY OF COMMUNITY OF THE 4 VALLEYS (C.C.4.V.)

Description: This contract is a framework agreement aimed at the purchase and delivery of professional clothing. The latter is broken down into two lots, each treated as a separate market. For each lot, the market is concluded with a minimum amount and an amount maximum. Lot n°1: purchase and delivery of professional clothing for municipal police officers. (annual minimum of 5,000 euros excluding tax and annual maximum of 25,000 euros excluding tax). Lot n°2: purchase and delivery of professional clothing for agents of the other municipal services. (annual minimum of 5,000 euros excluding tax and annual maximum of 25,000 euros excluding tax). This framework agreement with purchase orders is concluded for an initial period of 12 months and is tacitly renewable 3 times 12 months without its duration maximum cannot exceed 4 years.. instruction: Extract and classify the tender information into structured fields such as TOT ID, Tender Notice No, Tender Value, Currency, CPV, Sector, Sub-Sector, and More Details link from the following tender text.
input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: SNCF NETWORK. Summary: Development / Supply and Mco Market for 6Th Generation Hot Box Detectors (Dbc 6). Description: The DBC System is a system that helps reduce the risk of derailment caused by damage to the rolling stock (axle box) or the risk of triggering embankment fires caused by an applied brake. To accomplish this mission, the DBC system monitors the temperature of the axle boxes and detects applied brakes when passing traffic. The DBC 6 Development, Supply and Maintenance in Operational Condition contract constitutes a building block of the overall monitoring project. Trains en Marche (STEM) from SNCF Réseau. It concerns a new generation of DBC, DBC 6, intended to replace or complement the generations of DBC currently deployed by SNCF Réseau on the National Rail Network. input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: CEA GRENOBLE. Summary: Supply of Deep Engraving Equipment. Description: CEA-LETI wishes to acquire 200 mm equipment with a 200 mm deep silicon etching chamber. The silicon deep etch chamber must be able to perform Bosch and non-Bosch Si etch processes, be gas compatible fluorinated and carry out the etching through the wafer. This equipment must be able to process different types of substrates in automatic mode, without modification or material change: bonded wafers (silicon on SOG glass and silicon on silicon), pads of different thicknesses, pads with organic layers on the back and pads with engraved cavities on the back. The tool must be equipped with an OES end-of-process detection system, an insert beveled edge protection system and an end-of-process detection system for Via Reveal engraving. The obligatory option: - Option n°1: Level 1 maintenance training Optional options: -Option #2: Chiller -Option n°3: Pump -Option n°4: Electrical transformer -Option n°5: Advanced maintenance training -Option n°6: 1 additional year warranty extension Supply of deep engraving equipment CEA-LETI wishes to acquire 200 mm equipment with a 200 mm deep silicon etching chamber. The room silicon deep etch must be able to perform Bosch and non-Bosch Si etching processes, be compatible with fluorinated gases, and perform through-the-wafer etching. This equipment must.... input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: MONTPELLIER MEDITERRANEAN METROPOLIS. Summary: Public Service Delegation for the Award of Sub-Contracts for the Operation of Beach Lots 1 and 2 Located in the Territory of the Commune of Villeneuve - Les- Maguelone. Description: The concession for natural beaches in the commune of Villeneuve-lès-Maguelone granted to Montpellier Méditerranée Métropole by prefectural decree extends over a period of 10 years (period 2019-2029), with occupation of the Public Maritime Domain included between March and October, but limited to 6 months per year. The annual occupancy period of 6 months, including assembly, operation and dismantling, may be set each year by a metropolitan decree. By default, the operating period (assembly and dismantling) is set from April 1 to September 30. The metropolis plans to subcontract two batches of beaches, for a period ranging from notification of the contract until December 31, 2029: Lot 1: Prévost Beach - Equipment rental with catering Batch 2: Prévost Beach - Equipment rental with motorized watercraft A restaurant is also located set back from the dune barrier in the parking lot outside the Public Maritime Domain (DPM). Given the configuration of the premises, this space located in the parking lot adjoining is intended to be the subject of a temporary occupation authorization related to the operation of the beach lot, and will be allocated to the same operator as that of lot 1 Beach lot n°1 located on Prévost beach welcomes as its main activity rental of beach equipment and, as an ancillary activity, catering. Maximum authorized surface area: 1000m². The operating subcontract will be concluded for a period ranging from notification of the contract.... Published Date: 2025-12-19. Closing Date: 2026-01-26. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

By default, the operating period (assembly and dismantling) is set from April 1 to September 30. input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: ANGERS LOIRE METROPOLE (49). Summary: Dynamic Acquisition System for the Purchase of Light or Heavy Vehicles, New or Used. Description: Dynamic acquisition system for a period of 4 years, renewable once for 4 years. 8 categories Light vehicles The vehicle fleet of the City of Angers and Angers Loire Métropole has more than 938 vehicles, including 819 light vehicles. The segment of passenger vehicles brings together 417 units, of which more than 125 are electric. The objective of this market is the acquisition of vehicles such as small city cars and versatile compacts, with thermal or electric engines, in order to meet the legal requirement of a minimum of 40% of so-called clean vehicles imposed by the Climate and Resilience law. Van utility vehicles The vehicle fleet of the City of Angers and Angers Loire Métropole has more than 938 vehicles, including 819 light vehicles. The utility vehicle segment includes 402 units, including 219 vans, 85 of which are electric. The objective of this market is the acquisition of 2 or 5 seater vans, with thermal or electric engines, in order to meet the legal requirement of a minimum of 40% of so-called clean vehicles imposed by the Climate and Resilience law. Van utility vehicles less than 3.5T The vehicle fleet of the City of Angers and Angers Loire Métropole has more than 938 vehicles, including 819 light vehicles. input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: ILLZACH TOWN HALL. Summary: Restructuring and Extension of the Jonquilles School Group with Creation of an After-School Program in Illzach. Description: The town of Illzach wishes to undertake a restructuring and extension of the Jonquilles school group including: - Restructuring of the two existing schools (nursery and elementary), - Construction of a new extracurricular, with restoration on place (co-project management with m2A), - Exterior arrangements. This project is part of an ANRU district and must meet mandatory dates and execution conditions such as economic integration clauses with the companies in charge. of the work (the batches concerned are detailed in the DCE documents including article 13 of the CCAP). The school group will ultimately be composed of a kindergarten with 6 classrooms, an elementary school with 10 classes and an after-school school with 4 activity rooms and a catering area as well as an office. The operation will take place in different phases with a schedule providing for: a temporary move from kindergarten to after-school activities for the 2027 winter holidays (February 2027) a temporary move of elementary into after-school and commissioning of kindergarten for winter holidays 2028 (February 2028) elementary move-in for winter break 2029 (February 2029) a move into the extracurricular completed in April 2029. The duration of the work will therefore be 41 months (including the preparation period). The description of the work, the works, their technical specifications as well as a timetable.... Published Date: 2025-12-19. Closing Date: 2026-02-09. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

Summary: Framework Agreement for Purchase Orders and Subsequent Contracts Relating to the Supply, Maintenance and Delivery of Inflatable Visibility Supports and Structures during Events. Description: The public contract is concluded for a period of 12 months from the date of notification with 2 tacit renewals of 12 months. This is a single-award framework agreement concluded with a single economic operator. input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: TOWN OF DÉCINES-CHARPIEU. Summary: Acquisition, Delivery, Assembly and Installation of School, Extracurricular and Extracurricular Furniture for the City of Décines-Charpieu. Description: This consultation concerns the acquisition, delivery, assembly and installation of school, extracurricular and extracurricular furniture according to the conditions established in the consultation documents. The town of Décines-Charpieu inaugurates in 2026 a new outdoor center and wishes to equip it with furniture (activity room furniture, rest room and catering furniture, etc.). This contract also concerns the renewal of the furniture of the various school groups in the City (furniture of nursery and elementary classes, catering furniture, etc.). This is a single-award framework agreement with purchase orders, concluded for an initial period of one year and tacitly renewable three times, for periods of one year each. It is concluded without minimum amount and with the following maximum annual amounts: 110,000 euro(s) excluding tax (1st year) / 50,000 euro(s) excluding tax (2nd year) / 30,000 euro(s) excluding tax (3rd year) / 30,000 euro(s) excluding tax (4th year). Published Date: 2025-12-19. Closing Date: 2026-01-26. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

The town of Décines-Charpieu inaugurates in 2026 a new outdoor center and wishes to equip it with furniture (activity room furniture, rest room and catering furniture, etc.). Description: This consultation concerns the purchase of household appliances, sound and images, intended for the services of the Departments of Bouches-du-Rhône. The types of equipment concerned by this market may include in a non-exhaustive manner: - Consumer or professional type household appliances (heating/air conditioning, cooking, small household appliances, etc.). - Sound and Image (headphones, TV) for the general public. - Any accessories and consumables associated with the families above. The framework agreement is concluded with a minimum annual amount of €10,000 excluding tax and a maximum annual amount of €100,000 excluding tax. Location(s) of execution: various sites in the Bouches-du-Rhône Department (see CCTP appendix). input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: ELECTRICITY TRANSMISSION NETWORK (RTE). Summary: 24901 - Renewal of the Supply of Weather Stations and Associated Services. Description: To cover all the needs for the supply of sensors and associated data acquisition services for the industrialization of DLR (Dynamic Line Rating) solutions, RTE set up a framework market in June 2025. These DLR systems allow, based on one or more parameters measured in the field, to determine a dynamic transit capacity which then replaces the IST/IT values ​​(Temporary Backup Intensity / Overload Intensities) in the management and study tools. This dynamic transit capacity is also referred to by the acronym ampacity (for ampere capacity). The objective is to free up additional margins on the works to remove certain constraints or to manage them differently by optimizing the parades. To do this, the MyDLR solution requires deploying temporary weather stations for a period of two years. This data is then used to train a learning model capable of estimating transit capacities only at from weather forecasts. Once the model is trained, the stations can be removed and reused on other airlines. A descriptive document of the project will be available on the BRAVOSOLUTION platform. Renewal of the supply of weather stations and associated services To cover all needs for the supply of sensors and associated data acquisition services for the industrialization of DLR (Dynamic Line Ra) solutions.... Published Date: 2025-12-18. Closing Date: 2026-01-19. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: LOGIAL COOP. Summary: Framework Agreement with Purchase Orders for the Supply of Meal Vouchers for Unhoused Staff of Logial-Coop. Description: This consultation concerns a framework agreement with purchase orders for the supply of meal vouchers for unhoused Logial-COOP staff. The purpose of this framework agreement is to provide the following services: -Manufacturing and provision associated card supports (transport and delivery) within Logial-COOP headquarters; -Loading and reloading of dematerialized restaurant vouchers on smart card support and the provision of related services for the benefit of staff; -The bet available to the greatest number of restaurateurs and affiliated merchants; -Support by the holder during the implementation of dematerialized restaurant vouchers; -The additional services offered by the holder and validated by Logial-COOP. There The provision of services constitutes an obligation to achieve results, with the implementation of adequate means. The services must comply with the stipulations of the framework agreement (the applicable standards and regulations being those in force on the date notification of the framework agreement). The consistency of the mission is described in the Specifications of Special Technical Clauses (C.C.T.P.) and in all the documents in the consultation file. The framework agreement is neither allocated nor broken down into tranches optional. The framework agreement is concluded for a period of one year from its date of notification or its effective date, if this is subsequent to notification. It may be renewed.... Published Date: 2025-12-18. Closing Date: 2026-01-23. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: DEPARTMENT OF SAÔNE-ET-LOIRE. Summary: Establishment of an Operating Market for Climate Engineering Installations in Buildings in the Department of Saône-Et-Loire. Description: Establishment of an operating market for climate engineering installations in buildings in the Department of Saône-et-Loire This market will include the following services: - P1 Energy: Supply of fuel necessary for the production of heating and DHW in the form of a market: MTI - Temperature market with profit-sharing MCI - Meter market with profit-sharing CP - Fuel service market - P2 Maintenance: Operation, maintenance, upkeep and monitoring services for engineering installations thermal for all sites and equipment listed in Appendix 1 of the CCTP. - P3 Total Guarantee: Major maintenance services and total guarantee of thermal engineering installations on all sites. The P3 will be of the GTR type (total guarantee with distribution). This is an operation and maintenance contract, lasting 5 years from the date of notification of the contract with possible renewal once for a period of 3 years, i.e. a maximum total duration of 8 years. The visit of sites is not obligatory but recommended, refer to the stipulations of article 6.1 of the consultation regulations. Doc Title: Establishment of an operating market for climate engineering installations in buildings of the Department of Saône-et-Loire Contract Type: services. Published Date: 2025-12-17. input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: COMMUNITY OF COMMUNES OF PAYS DE FALAISE. Summary: Contract N°2025-13: Restructuring of a Former Industrial Site in Falaise. Description: The Community of Communes of Pays de Falaise is carrying out a project to rehabilitate the former SATAM activity building (industrial company established for over 70 years in Falaise, specializing in legal metrology, design, manufacturing, implementation). service and maintenance of volumetric meters in the petroleum sector). This restructuring will allow the Pays de Falaise Community of Communes to sustain jobs in its catchment area and will benefit from suitable surface areas for growth. of its head office. Indeed, the restructuring project will consist of: -Rehabilitation and adaptation of the office space so that it becomes the head office of the Community of Communes of Pays de Falaise (CCPF), (approximately 1,100m²), -Rehabilitation, division of the workshop space to offer business real estate (around 4,000 m²). In addition, this restructuring project is fully in line with the policy of limiting land consumption and the resorption of industrial or industrial wastelands. of wastelands to come. A first phase of work consisting of the decontamination and demolition of the site is underway and should be completed at the beginning of April 2026. This call for tenders concerns the rehabilitation work of the building. LOT 1: VRD - EARTHWORKS - GREEN SPACES LOT 2: FENCES - GATES LOT 3: MAJOR WORK LOT 4: METAL FRAMEWORK LOT 5: WOODEN FRAMEWORK LOT 6: COVERING - WATERPROOFING LOT 7: CLADDING LOT 8: LOCKSMITH LOT 9: CLOSED.... Published Date: 2025-12-17. Closing Date: 2026-02-06. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: DALKIA CENTER WEST (37). Summary: Clea Heat Network - St Herblain Vigneau Boiler Works - Relaunch. Description: Additional market information: CLEA, a subsidiary of DALKIA, is the concessionaire for a heating network serving the Bellevue, Dervallières and ATLANTIS districts in Nantes/St Herblain (10,000 housing equivalents). The CLEA network is made up of three main branches: NORTH, SOUTH, EXTENSION, and a gas boiler / biomass boiler connection. The planned work concerns the creation of the new boiler room responsible for injecting heat into the heating network. The market concerns roadworks, earthworks, civil engineering, framing, roofing, fitting out of social premises, locksmithing, finishing work on the building which will contain a gas boiler and a heat pump. The planned surface area of ​​the building is 870m² for a height total of 14m. The buyer reserves the right to reject an application if he considers his financial capacities insufficient or if these technical and professional capacities seem manifestly insufficient to meet the need. The contracting entity reserves the possibility of carrying out similar services article R 2122-7 of the Public Procurement Code. Lot 3 - Metalwork - Locksmith - Cladding Metalwork, locksmithing and cladding work as part of the construction of a building boiler room. Les travaux comprennent la fournitures et la pose de portes métalliques intérieures et extérieures, de portes sectionnelles, de châssis vitrée aluminium, de grilles de ventilation, d'une échelle à crinol.... Published Date: 2025-12-17. Closing Date: 2026-01-09. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: CURIE INSTITUTE. Summary: Renovation of the Curie Institute in Saint-Cloudlots 2,5,7 and 11. Description: The purpose of this contract is to carry out renovation work on several areas representing approximately 4,000m² within the Institut Curie on the Saint Cloud site. The works operation constitutes a contract divided into 11 lots. The main procedure planned for the rehabilitation operation is the open call for tenders. Nevertheless, the buyer plans to use an adapted open procedure with the possibility of negotiation (MAPA) for certain lots of limited amount, in accordance with the provisions of Article R.2123-1 of the Public Procurement Code. Only lots 2, 5, 7 and 11 are affected by this adapted open procedure with the possibility of negotiation (MAPA). input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: SDEC ENERGY. Summary: Supply of Pre-Wired, Zhaga D4I Certified Painted Led Luminaires for Road or Residential Lighting. Description: This framework agreement concerns the supply of painted, pre-wired, Zhaga D4i certified LED luminaires, associated with either a remote personal protection surge protector or a remote surge protector, for lighting roadways or residential The estimated, non-contractual quantities are 3,000 units per year. The materials proposed must make it possible to achieve the levels required for satisfactory lighting while respecting the black frame in CALVADOS and to offer the conditions of the RES EC 104 sheet for obtaining CEE ( - the power supply auxiliaries and the LED module can be replaced; - in the event of installation of a new luminaire, the luminaire has a degree of protection (IP) of at least 65 - the LED modules with a color temperature greater than or equal to 2,500 K have a luminous efficiency at 50% of the nominal luminous flux (i.e. at full load) inclusive greater than or equal to 135 lumens per watt; - LED modules with a color temperature strictly lower than 2,500 K have a luminous efficiency at 50% of the nominal luminous flux (i.e. at full load) inclusive greater than or equal to 110 lumens per watt; - the lifespan announced for L90B50 of the LED module is greater than or equal to 100,000 hours; - the equipment auxiliary has a mortality rate at 100,000 hours less than or equal to 10%.) SUPPLY OF PRE-WIRED, ZHAGA D4I CERTIFIED PAINTED LED LUMINAIRES FOR ROAD OR RESIDENTIAL LIGHTING This framework agreement concerns the.... Published Date: 2025-12-17. Closing Date: 2026-01-26. input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: PROVENCE-ALPES-CÔTE D-AZUR REGION. Summary: Acquisition of Office Furniture for Services in the Provence-Alpes-Côte D'Azur Region and Associated Services. Description: The consultation is launched in the form of an open call for tenders in accordance with articles R2161-2 to R2161-5 and R.2162.1 et seq. of the public procurement code. The framework agreements will be concluded with a single economic operator in accordance with articles R.2162-2 et seq. of the Public Procurement Code. They will be executed, in accordance with article R.2162-3 of the public procurement code, in part by: - ​​The issuance of purchase orders, for the services provided for in the unit price schedule (BPU) and in the catalog falling within the scope of the framework agreement in compliance with articles R.2162-13 and R.2162-14 - The conclusion of subsequent contracts, for services not provided for in the BPU or in the catalog, in compliance with articles R.2162-7 to R.2162-12. These contracts will specify the characteristics and methods of execution of the services concerned. These include specific services or furniture, which are difficult to predict or cannot be identified in advance due to their technicalities. THE services are divided into 3 lots which will be the subject of separate contracts. Candidates can bid for all lots. There are no plans to break it down into sections. Published Date: 2025-12-16. Closing Date: 2026-01-30. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

Summary: Supply, Delivery of Tires, Accessories and Associated Services Intended for Vehicles and Machinery of the Hérault Departmental Council. Description: The framework agreement is concluded for an initial period of 12 months from the date of notification of the contract. The framework agreement will be executed by issuing purchase orders. Each lot will be awarded separately. The services are paid by unit prices and catalog prices. The estimated amounts are indicative and include all renewal periods. This contract concerns the supply and delivery of tires, accessories and services for the entire fleet of equipment and vehicles of the Hérault departmental council. Associated services are understood to mean operations delegated to the holder's premises (geometry of the front axle, exchange of a tire, etc.) and interventions in the sector of use of the vehicle (exchange, repair of a machine tire, agricultural tractor, heavy goods vehicle, etc.). Published Date: 2025-12-16. Closing Date: 2026-01-26. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

output.Summary: Supply, Delivery of Tires, Accessories and Associated Services Intended for Vehicles and Machinery of the Hérault Departmental Council

The requested service includes the supply of generators, transport logistics, associated equipment (additional tanks, cables, class 2 box, connectors) as well as fuel refueling (GNR, AdBlue, etc.). input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: DEPARTMENT OF DORDOGNE. Summary: Supplies of Dematerialized Restaurant Tickets for Agents of the Dordogne Departmental Council. Description: The purpose of this contract is the supply, delivery and management of electronic meal vouchers for agents of the Dordogne Departmental Council (excluding family assistants and children's village agents). The service includes: - the supply and delivery of dematerialized restaurant vouchers. - the provision of an IT solution for managing restaurant voucher orders (WEB ordering tool). - access to a personal beneficiary account via an online platform secure and an application. It is concluded in the form of a framework agreement with purchase orders with a maximum quantity set at 1,497,200 restaurant vouchers per year. It lasts for one year and is renewable 3 times tacitly. A phase is planned preparatory prior to the implementation of the service. This preparatory phase will begin upon notification of the framework agreement. During this phase, lasting a maximum of 8 weeks, the incumbent must: - Configure the command tool in line, - Configure the cards, - Place a test order (menu and restaurant vouchers) The first order must be able to be carried out in June 2026: loading of the cards in the month of June 2026 (working days in the month of May 2026) SUPPLIES OF DEMATERIALIZED RESTAURANT TICKETS FOR AGENTS OF THE DORDOGNE DEPARTMENTAL COUNCIL The purpose of this contract is the supply, delivery and management of dematerialized restaurant vouchers for agents.... Published Date: 2025-12-16. Closing Date: 2026-01-20. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: CALORIES (77). Summary: Supply, Storage and Transport of Composite Casings for Geothermal Drilling. Description: 5B Supply, control, storage and delivery of composite casings. As an indication and not exhaustive, the works will include over the first 350 meters a first vertical section drilled 26', steel cased 20', composite cased 13'3/8, followed by a deviated section with progressive rise drilled 17'1/2, steel cased 13'3/8, composite cased 9'5/8 over the next 1,900 m. A final stabilized sloping section drilled in 12'1/4 without casing will penetrate the Dogger. Supply, storage and transport of composite casings for geothermal drilling 5B Supply, control, storage and delivery of composite casings. As an indication and not exhaustive, the works will include over the first 350 meters a first vertical section drilled 26', cased 20' steel, 13'3/8 composite cased, followed by a deflected section with progressive rise drilled 17'1/2, 13'3/8 steel cased, 9'5/8 composite cased over the next 1,900 m. A final section in stabilized inclination drilled in 12'1/4 without casing will penetrate into the Dogger. Doc Title: Supply, storage and transport of composite casings for geothermal drilling Contract Type: supplies. Published Date: 2025-12-16. Closing Date: 2026-01-15. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

The Project Owner will be one of the shareholder communities of the SPL Agence Ecomobilité Savoie Mont-Blanc. The developments will mainly be cycle facilities (path cycle path, green lane), road developments allowing easier insertion of the cycle (road with unmarked central lane, zone 30, cycle lanes, etc.), pedestrian developments (meeting zone, sidewalk), carpooling arrangements (drop-off), crossing structures (pedestrian/cycle tunnels, footbridges). input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: SNCF NETWORK. Summary: Supply of Gtc Ng Equipment. Description: The project mentioned is called: GTC v2 or NG. Its objective is to supervise telecom equipment on a national scale, with the centralization of information. Network coverage constraints are a key point of our project. Due to the geographical location of Telecom buildings and their associated activities, some are connected to SNCF networks such as SIRIUS and INFRACOM, others are not at all. To do this, the supply purchasing file concerns the purchase of sensors wired and non-wired. These sensors are of the following types: Temperature probe, Water detection, Smoke detection, Gas detection, Door opening detection. To be monitorable, we need an IoT/wireless gateway. In this sense, the choice a solution that is both wired and non-wired is necessary to overcome environmental constraints and benefit from supervision throughout the national territory. SNCF reserves the right to install one or the other solution depending on the local constraints. Supply of GTC NG equipment The project mentioned is called: GTC v2 or NG. input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: PARIS AIRPORTS. Summary: Design and Implementation Process to Increase the Capacity of the Cdgval Transport System at the Paris-Charles De Gaulle Airport Platform. Description: The purpose of this consultation is to award a design/construction contract with a view to increasing the capacity of the CDGVAL transport system at the Paris-Charles de Gaulle airport platform. Indeed, in order to adapt the demand for the intra-platform transport offer, Aéroports de Paris wishes to award a design/construction contract to increase the storage and transport capacities of the CDGVAL automatic public transport system at Paris-Charles de Gaulle airport currently in operation, while perpetuating the current system. Thus, the services envisaged consist of optimizing and adding functionalities to the existing system, whose technical and functional characteristics are based on software, protocols, hardware and interfaces developed by the SIEMENS company. Indeed, the passenger carrying capacity must be increased to cope with forecasts of increased user flows, it will be necessary to achieve in particular: 1/ The construction of 3 additional storage lanes in the CDGVAL workshop garage including, among other things, the guideway, driving automation and traction energy perimeters. 2/ Adaptation of the existing automation system of the line to take into account: a/The need to increase carrying capacities; b/ the integration of trains transferred from LISA to the CDGVAL line into the network. c/ The new storage routes. 3/ The potential adaptation of.... Published Date: 2025-12-15. Closing Date: 2025-12-19. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: TOWN OF SARREGUEMINES. Summary: Global Public Energy Performance Contract Relating to the Rental with Option to Purchase and the Operation and Maintenance of Public Lighting Equipment. Description: The City of Sarreguemines has decided to undertake an energy renovation operation for its existing public lighting fleet. In this context, the City is considering the conclusion of a Global Performance Market aimed at the installation of equipment high-quality public lighting, integrating a remote management device for each light point. This approach is based on the use of innovative technologies to ensure: - increased energy sobriety, - a notable reduction in the costs of operation (management, maintenance, operation), - and an overall improvement in the technical performance of the installations. The offers presented by the candidates must guarantee an optimal balance between energy sobriety, security and attractiveness. urban, while integrating the communication and consultation aspects necessary to inform the City and its citizens. This orientation is broken down into four priority areas: - Reduction of light pollution and preservation of biodiversity, - Optimization of electrical energy consumption, meeting a dual ecological and economic objective, - Deployment of advanced technologies (LED lighting, remote management systems), - Improvement of technical performances, including the renovation of assets, limiting the risks of breakdowns or disasters, and improving the living environment. input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: EDF POWER SOLUTIONS. Summary: Market for the Supply of Agricultural Photovoltaic Structures. Description: Vouneuil-Sous-Biard 2 is a 6.67 MWp agricultural photovoltaic solar project located in the municipality of Vouneuil-Sous-Biard in the Vienne department (86) in the Nouvelle-Aquitaine region. The project will be used to house cattle, hence the need for monopile tables with a module low point of 2.4m and a line spacing of 4m. This contract concerns the supply of agri-photovoltaic structures and the dimensioning of their foundations. The scope of contract Lot No. 3 - Supply of structures is as follows: • Dimensioning of the foundations and support structure • Execution of pull-out tests to validate the foundations • Supply of support structures for the photovoltaic modules • Supply and installation of string inverter supports (optional) Coordination with companies working on the electrical BOS lots for the installation of string inverters in accordance with the chosen architecture (supply of necessary additional parts); Some of the services provided by the various trades may be optional. These options will be defined during the consultation process. Additional work may be optional. This option will be specified in the consultation file. For confidentiality reasons, the documents relating to this contract notice and your response must be sent to the following website: hhttps://pha2.edf.com (AVIS020944), after a confidentiality agreement has been validated. <br> Doc Title: Market for the supply of agricultural photovoltaic structures <br> Contract Type: supplies. input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: GRAND EST REGION. Summary: Acquisition and Installation of Equipment and Accessories for Car Bodywork Painter Training Courses at the Lycée Blaise Pascal in Forbach (57). Description: The contract subject of the consultation aims at the acquisition and installation of equipment and accessories for the preparation and application of automobile paints concerning the automobile bodywork painter training courses at the Lycée Blaise Pascal in FORBACH. The project consists of upgrading the technical platform of the AT1 workshop at the Lycée Blaise Pascal, following the transfer of training from the Hurlevent Professional High School in Behren-lès-Forbach, which will close in July 2027. The market includes the supply, delivery, installation and putting into working order of equipment and accessories, recovery of packaging as well as associated on-site training of supervisory user personnel. The paint booth, preparation area 2 stations with heated compensation, the sanding vacuum central connected to 6 multi-energy satellites and the equipment of a preparation and cleaning laboratory are intended for the training of high school students, apprentices, students and interns of continuing education of the following courses: CAP specialty Automotive Painter and Professional Baccalaureate specialty Automotive Bodywork Painter and any other course in the fields of paint preparation and application automobile. These machines are intended for learning the methods and processes of surface preparation operations before painting (puttying, sanding, marouflage and drying) and the production of painting.... input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: COMMUNITY OF COMMUNITIES OF THE GUEBWILLER REGION (CCRG). Summary: Supply and Implementation of Automated Systems for Upgrading the Remote Management of Sites External to the Steu. Description: The purpose of this contract is to upgrade remote management equipment in anticipation of the removal of RTC, 2G and 3G lines. It includes: • the purchase, supply and installation of equipment (programmable industrial controllers, data loggers, 4G/5G communication equipment), • associated electrical and cabling work, • integration into existing Topkapi type supervision, • creation or updating of synoptics, • implementation of work laws validated by the Agency of Rhine-Meuse Water, • cybersecurity and regulatory compliance (self-monitoring). The contract concerns 27 lifting stations and 19 storm spillways (including 13 to be re-equipped) across the entire CCRG territory.. Published Date: 2025-12-15. Closing Date: 2026-01-19. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: GRAND EAST REGION. Summary: Acquisition and Installation of Equipment and Accessories for Car Bodywork Painter Training Courses at the Lycée Blaise Pascal in Forbach (57). Description: The contract subject of the consultation aims at the acquisition and installation of equipment and accessories for the preparation and application of automobile paints concerning the automobile bodywork painter training courses at the Lycée Blaise Pascal in FORBACH. The project consists of upgrading the technical platform of the AT1 workshop at the Lycée Blaise Pascal, following the transfer of training from the Hurlevent Professional High School in Behren-lès-Forbach, which will close in July 2027. The contract includes the supply, delivery, installation and putting into working order of equipment and accessories, recovery of packaging as well as associated on-site training of supervisory user personnel. The paint booth, preparation area 2 stations with heated compensation, the sanding vacuum central connected to 6 multi-energy satellites and the equipment of a preparation and cleaning laboratory are intended for the training of high school students, apprentices, students and interns of continuing education of the following courses: CAP specialty Automotive Painter and Professional Baccalaureate specialty Automotive Bodywork Painter and any other course in the fields of paint preparation and application automobile. These machines are intended for learning the methods and processes of surface preparation operations before painting (puttying, sanding, marouflage and drying) and the production of painting.... input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: DEPARTMENT OF ALPES DE HAUTE PROVENCE. Summary: Supply of Fresh Fruit Juice, Shell Eggs, Egg Products and Farm Dairy Products, as Part of a Direct Supply Approach for Agricultural Products.. Description: The Department of Alpes de Haute-Provence wishes to contribute to the protection of the environment and sustainable development in its food supply markets, as well as to the nutritional and taste quality of the meals served in the 9 colleges served by the Culinary Preparation Unit, which represents an average of 3,700 meals per day. The purpose of this consultation is to provide foodstuffs from an environmentally friendly production method and intended to reduce the environmental impacts of food consumption. The supply of these foodstuffs is part of an approach to supplying fresh, quality and seasonal products, in a short supply chain, that is to say development of direct supplies of agricultural products. They must also be labeled Egalim or organic farming (AB or European or equivalent). Published Date: 2025-12-14. Closing Date: 2026-01-27. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed
